评论概述: Rugged, Well worth the price for the value.
评论详情: The Pros: Great product when you need to be professional looking. It fits just right and I wear them not as overalls sometimes. Very comfortable to wear over straight underwear as dress clothes. Spray with waterproofing, to really make this a great lightweight snow pants. I bought the 3x size & love them. I do construction & truck driving as a professional repair men. The Cons: Are very few. One is a longer front zipper for shorter strap setup & Urinal use for men. Zipper sits too high up for easy urinal use. Another is lack of a liner for winter outdoor use. You can use sweat pants as a liner. The straps material excess needs to be sewn along edge to keep them straight and inline to keep from being in the way.
Perfecttttt

Was charged a return shipping fee even though the item description was not accurate on the sizing. Sizing chart plainly states that 3XL will fit a height of 77-78 inches NOT TRUE unless you like your length 2-3 inches above your ankles. I am 75inches and these things were way above my ankles. If you are going to promote a certain size and it is not accurate then return shipping should be FREE.
